name: Sun Power
description:
In Sun Power you play as Sunny Bravo and have to make sure that the humans won't reach the escape pod in the middle.

You can do this by firing a fireball by left clicking and a bigger fireball by right clicking. The bigger fireball deals more damage and can damage multiple humans at the same time, but you only have 10 per round.

Sun Power has four different themes and has several comic strips drawn by me.

This game was made about 10 years ago by me and was the first game I have ever developed. I created all assets myself.

The game is about half an hour to an hour long.
